sentences.sContent: The spokesman said no decision on the proposal was likely in the immediate future.
sentences.sCn: 该发言人称近期不太可能有有关该提案的决议。

sentences.sContent: He was making plans for the future.
sentences.sCn: 他正在为将来制定计划。

phrases.pCn: 期货交易所；远期外汇；外汇期货

trans.tranCn: 期货；未来，前途（future的复数形式）
trans.tranOther: The future is the period of time that will come after the present, or the things that will happen then
